titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal Government should relinquish its temporary ownership interests in the General Motors Corporation and Chrysler Group, LLC, as soon as possible and should not micromanage or unduly intercede in management decisions of such companies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 6/19/2009--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the federal government should: (1) divest itself of its temporary ownership interest in the General Motors Corporation and the Chrysler Group, LLC, as quickly as possible; and (2) not micromanage and unduly intercede in the management of the automobile companies in which it takes such an interest.
